reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Peru/Colombia Serious Organised Crime (Formerly Combatting Illicit Economies - Colombia/Peru/Panama)

description.narrative: This programme engages with Peruvian and Colombian law enforcement agencies to improve their capability and to enable more effective criminal proceedings being taken against those involved in serious organised crime. This programme included Covid-19 activity in FY 20/21 Q1 and Q2.

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
